info.ronjenkins.maven.rtr.steps.release

Class AbstractSmartReactorReleaseStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.ronjenkins.maven.rtr.steps.AbstractSmartReactorStep
      • info.ronjenkins.maven.rtr.steps.release.AbstractSmartReactorReleaseStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SmartReactorStep
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoPostReleaseFailure, DoPostReleaseSuccess, RebuildReleaseReactor, TransformProjectsIntoReleases

    public abstract class AbstractSmartReactorReleaseStep
extends AbstractSmartReactorStep
    Base implementation of a Smart Reactor release step. No-op unless the Smart Reactor's release property is true at runtime.
    Author:
    Ronald Jack Jenkins Jr.

    • Method Detail

      • configureReleaseDescriptor

        protected void configureReleaseDescriptor(org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session,
                                          RTRComponents components)
        Subclasses can override this method to configure the release descriptor injected by Plexus. The default implementation does nothing.
        Parameters:
        session - the session to which this step applies. Not null.
        components - that this step may need. May be null.

      • execute

        public final void execute(org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session,

                   throws org.apache.maven.MavenExecutionException
        Description copied from interface: SmartReactorStep
        Executes this step.
        Parameters:
        session - the session to which this step applies. Not null.
        components - that this step may need. May be null.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.MavenExecutionException - if any unrecoverable error occurs.

      • getAnnouncement

        protected abstract String getAnnouncement()
        Returns the announcement that is logged when this release step begins execution.
        Returns:
        null or empty will prevent the corresponding log entry from occurring.

      • getReleasePhases

        protected abstract List<String> getReleasePhases()
        Returns the list of phases that should be executed by this release step.
        Returns:
        never null or empty.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if this step does not execute any release phases.

      • getRollbackPhases

        protected abstract List<String> getRollbackPhases()
        Returns the list of phases that should be executed by this release step when rollback is required.
        Returns:
        never null or empty.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if this step does not execute any release phases.
